ItemDesc: Upon use, one of the following effects will be randomly applied to all allies in the next battle: Clockie's Whirlwind Fruit Tea — ATK increases by <unbreak>36%</unbreak>. Brother Hanu's Boba Tea — CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>18%</unbreak>. Mr. Soda's Orange-Peel Latte — CRIT DMG increases by <unbreak>36%</unbreak>.
ItemBGDesc: A limited-edition version of Dreamville-themed drinks, offered exclusively in Clock Studios Theme Park. The flavors are random but are all very impressive.\n\n"...What's this flavor!? It's so weird... But I just wanna take another sip!"
